title: New: BANKS – Waiting Game (Produced by SOHN)
content:
Photo via Hunger Magazine

Rising star BANKS has a knack for getting the hottest producers on board, and new track Waiting Game is no different, finding her teaming up with CitR favourite SOHN. With the deep, rolling synth sections, and sampled vocals that dominate much of SOHN’s own work, it’s far and away her finest track to date. It’s bold, delicately poignant, and effortlessly slick. A host of tour dates coming up with The Weeknd, and rumours of numerous other collaborations in the works, Waiting Game is just the start of a very exciting few months for BANKS.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
